text: John McPhee (1909 – 1986) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1986 deaths Category:People from Stirling Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Brentford F.C. players Category:Albion Rovers F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Johnny McPhee
